content: it s amazing what a rich and complex design can be achieved with only two basic crochet stitches perfect for beginners … if you know how to work a single_crochet and a double_crochet you are all set first published on www petalstopicots com and also available in a convenient ad free ebook of 4 popular dishcloth patterns textured dishcloth crunchy stitch dishcloth 3-color simple-st dishcloth and seeing squares dishcloth http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/4-dishcloth-pattern-pack
